name: Print Google Sites
description: Google Sites offers an option to print a Google Sites webpage. This style does something similar with more control.
additional_info:
Tested with Firefox 28. For best results change the print settings of Firefox (footer and header with page title, url, ...) and change the default font used in Firefox to control how the footer and header look.
This works only with Google Sites using ths standard url which starts with https://sites.google.com/
